subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Broncos did not do the expected in the second round of the N.F.L. draft. Instead of taking a player to strengthen the defensive line, Denver picked an offensive tackle with a mean streak.
snippet: The Broncos did not do the expected in the second round of the N.F.L. draft. Instead of taking a player to strengthen the defensive line, Denver picked an offensive tackle with a mean streak.
